item.description:
Are you interested in learning what taiko is all about? Come to Rutsubo Taiko's first workshop of the summer! Learn how kuchishouga (spoken rhythms) work, how to hold bachi (drumsticks), how to hit some basic patterns, and much more. No experience required!

8:00pm to 9:30pm. Make sure to bring comfortable, loose-fitting clothing. A $10 donation is suggested for this meetup.

 

IMPORTANT: Our friends at Rutsubo Taiko are running this meetup. (Arigatou!! ^^) They have indicated that a limited number of spots are available, so PLEASE RSVP using the form available here: http://bit.ly/j16z3W.
item.how_to_find_us: Take the 39 bus to Myrtle St. OR it is a short walk from the Green St. stop on the Orange Line
item.name: Let's Play Taiko! ~Taiko Workshop~
